title: Mark Carney - Wikipedia
snippet: Carney was widely expected to call a federal parliamentary election for late April or early May 2025, ahead of the required election date in October.

title: Canada Prime Minister Mark Carney calls snap election
snippet: Canada's newly appointed Prime Minister Mark Carney has called a snap election, sending the country to the polls on 28 April.

title: Premiership of Mark Carney - Wikipedia
snippet: The premiership of Mark Carney began on March 14, 2025, when the first Cabinet headed by Mark Carney was sworn in by Governor General Mary Simon. Carney was invited to form the 30th Canadian Ministry and become the 24th Prime Minister of Canada after he succeeded Prime Minister Justin Trudeau ...

title: Canadian PM Mark Carney announces April 28 election
snippet: The Canadian Prime Minister has called a general election for April 28. Newly-appointed Premier Mark Carney faces the vote amid a US trade war and annexation threats.

title: Canada: 2025 federal election - House of Commons Library
snippet: On 9 March, following Justin Trudeau's resignation, Mark Carney was elected leader of the Liberal Party and prime minister of Canada. He soon called a snap federal election for 28 April.
